DWF Toolkit Components

Collaboration diagram for DWF Toolkit Components:

Detailed Description

The DWF Toolkit is a Software Developer's Kit for the DWF Platform; it is comprised of several feature modules and streaming graphics libraries. The entire toolkit is cross-platform, enabled by the Autodesk DWF Core Library, and has been tested on Microsoft Windows, Apple Macintosh OS X and several Linux distributions with both 2.4 and 2.6 kernels.
